fields.description:
Detail pages include…

* Bucket details page
* Object details page

Note that the lifecycle editor story is tracked in GUI-1250

comments.body: Updated description and Wiki links to reflect that the folder details page will not be implemented.

Eucalyptus doesn't properly persist the header-like metadata (e.g. content-encoding) in a PUT operation, per EUCA-9948. [~zhill]: I've linked that ticket as a blocker for implementing the metadata editor (now tracked in GUI-1254) on the object details page.
Pull request ready for UX review at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/905

looking awesome! Some small nits:

Both pages:
* sharing panel, the block that adds an account is floating too far to the right, it should be left-justified please like shown in the wireframe
* sharing panel, full control missing from permissions dropdown
* sharing panel, button text should be title case, please
* sharing panel, needs implementation for if account has been entered but add account not clicked yet when save changes is clicked (similar to what we do for tags on detail pages)


Bucket details:
* needs the "should I stay or should I go" stuff from GUI-997 implemented
* save changes should be disabled until something is edited or changed. 

Object details:
* metadata panel has same alignment issue that sharing panel has, floated too far to the right. See wireframe for alignment.
* metadata panel, can you add a little space between the labels and text entry fields please, so they look like the ones on the sharing panel for example? They are really tight. 
* needs implementation for if metadata pair has been entered but add pair not clicked yet when save changes is clicked (similar to what we do for tags on detail pages)

[~jloza]: I've fixed the UX issues you brought up and a few more (see the OTHER ISSUES list for those)

Both pages:
* sharing panel, the block that adds an account is floating too far to the right, it should be left-justified please like shown in the wireframe  [DONE]
* sharing panel, full control missing from permissions dropdown  [DONE]
* sharing panel, button text should be title case, please  [DONE]
* sharing panel, needs implementation for if account has been entered but add account not clicked yet when save changes is clicked (similar to what we do for tags on detail pages)  [DONE]

Bucket details:
* needs the "should I stay or should I go" stuff from GUI-997 implemented [DONE]
* save changes should be disabled until something is edited or changed. [DONE]

Object details:
* metadata panel has same alignment issue that sharing panel has, floated too far to the right. See wireframe for alignment.  [DONE]
* metadata panel, can you add a little space between the labels and text entry fields please, so they look like the ones on the sharing panel for example? They are really tight.   [DONE]
* needs implementation for if metadata pair has been entered but add pair not clicked yet when save changes is clicked (similar to what we do for tags on detail pages)  [DONE]

OTHER ISSUES DISCOVERED AND FIXED:
* Allowing a "/" in the file name on the object details page during a rename creates one or more arbitrary folders [FIXED]
* Cancel button on object details page goes to buckets landing page  [FIXED]
* Tasks tab should be removed from bucket details page [DONE]
* Allow any input for content type in the metadata editor Chosen widget  [DONE]

Yay, UX review passed! Ready for code review. 

[~kgill], one thing, I notice the last modified value is always blank on objects. Are you having trouble retrieving that value or what's up there?
[~jloza]: I'm seeing the last modified timestamp on the bucket contents and details page on AWS, but only on the bucket contents page on Euca.  Will investigate.
[~jloza]: I've opened GUI-1256 and EUCA-9966 to track the missing last_modified issue on Eucalyptus
The Sharing Panel needs more work.  Also, we may want to reinstate the folder details page to allow ACLs to be managed at the folder level.

Pull request ready for UX review at https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/937

Note (for [~dkavanagh]) that https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/921 should be merged prior to code-reviewing PR 937, since the latest GUI-1207 work was branched off GUI-1209
Link to file on object details page now opens in a new window/tab.  Revamped sharing panel is ready for review.

awesome job! A couple of things:

* The indentation in the private panel should be like it is in the wireframe. Holler if you need details.
* The permissions choices for bucket details page don't match wireframe
* account ID needs validation (check with [~zhill] for what's allowable here)
* add account button should go back to disabled once I add one, and the account ID field is once again blank. It currently stays enabled
* account ID is required, I forgot to put that in the wireframe but will add it. Needs required field indicator in the label and the key added to the bottom of the screen. Sorry about that, my fault.
* clicking cancel should not trigger the "changes not saved" warning, it should just cancel. 
* read-write should be removed from account sharing permissions list for object details

[~jloza]: Updated GUI-1207 branch based on your feedback...

* The indentation in the private panel should be like it is in the wireframe. Holler if you need details.  [FIXED]
* The permissions choices for bucket details page don't match wireframe [FIXED]
* account ID needs validation (check with Zach Hill for what's allowable here)  [NEED DISCUSSION -- SEE BELOW]
* add account button should go back to disabled once I add one, and the account ID field is once again blank. It currently stays enabled [FIXED]
* account ID is required, I forgot to put that in the wireframe but will add it. Needs required field indicator in the label and the key added to the bottom of the screen. Sorry about that, my fault.  [DONE]
* clicking cancel should not trigger the "changes not saved" warning, it should just cancel.  [FIXED]
* read-write should be removed from account sharing permissions list for object details  [FIXED]

Note that the Account ID validation may need to be punted, since Foundation's validation machinery isn't cooperating with the "form-within-a-form" setup of the sharing panel (i.e. the validation patterns I pass to Foundation are completely ignored).  The Eucalyptus back-end validates the Account ID (well, it will when EUCA-9977 is fixed), and I'd imagine most users will simply copy-paste the 12-digit account ID or the 64-character canonical ID instead of typing them in, so the lack of client-side validation may be a relatively minor issue anyway.
GUI-1207 branch updated with UX fixes

Thanks [~kgill]! 

Opened GUI-1281 and GUI-1282 for a few small remaining items (CSS nits, account validation) TBD in sprint 5, so we can merge this for the sprint 4 demo, ready for code review.
